Poco M7 Pro 5G launched under Rs 15,000: 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip - India Today
summary:
Poco M7 Pro 5G launched under Rs 15,000: 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip

Published On: Dec 18, 2024 | Published By: Aman Rashid

The Poco M7 Pro 5G is an affordable smartphone in the sub-Rs 15,000 price segment, offering impressive features like a 120Hz display and good performance while having some limitations regarding software support.

Key Points:

  • A stunning 120Hz display: 6.67-inch FHD+ AMOLED with peak brightness of 2,100 nits.
  • Sleek and lightweight design: Comfortable to hold with a plastic back and vibrant colors.
  • Reliable performance and battery life: MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra processor with a 5110mAh battery and 45W fast charging.
  • 50MP camera with OIS: Primary camera for high-quality photos with optical image stabilization.

1 reason to skip:

Limited software support: Promises only two years of OS updates and does not ship with the latest Android version.
newTitle: Poco M7 Pro 5G launched under Rs 15,000: 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip

title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 13: Allu Arjun’s Franchise Total Surpasses Baahubali 1 + 2 & KGF: Chapter 1 + 2 – Decoding All Hindi Numbers! - Koimoi
summary:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 13: Allu Arjun’s Franchise Total Surpasses Baahubali 1 + 2 & KGF

Publication Date: December 17, 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun has made history with the Hindi version of Pushpa 2, achieving a 13-day box office total of ₹601.50 crore, marking it as the fastest film to reach 600 crores in Indian Cinema.

  • On day 13, the film earned ₹19.50 crore, only ₹1 crore less than the previous day.
  • The total box office collection for both Hindi parts of the franchise is ₹707.50 crore.
  • This franchise has surpassed the box office totals of both Baahubali films and KGF.
“Pushpa 2 is officially now the highest-grossing Hindi-dubbed South Indian franchise at the box office.”

This record-breaking achievement highlights the franchise's immense popularity and the growing success of dubbed South Indian films in Hindi cinema.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Surpasses Major Records

Laapataa Ladies team disappointed after Kiran Rao's film exits Oscars 2025 race: ‘For us, this is not the end’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Laapataa Ladies Team Disappointed After Oscars 2025 Exit

Date: Dec 18, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The team behind the film Laapataa Ladies expressed their disappointment after the film did not make the shortlist for the Best International Feature at the Oscars 2025. Despite the setback, they thanked the Academy and celebrated the recognition as India’s official entry.

  • The film failed to secure a position in the Oscars 2025 shortlist.
  • Makers expressed gratitude to the Academy and FFI jury.
  • The film's story revolves around two newly-wed brides exchanged during a train ride.
  • Filmmaker Hansal Mehta criticized the Film Federation of India for its selection process.
  • Fans and critics expressed disappointment on social media regarding the film's exclusion.
“For us, this is not the end but a step forward. We remain committed to bringing more powerful stories to life.”

The Laapataa Ladies team is determined to continue their journey in filmmaking, despite the Oscars disappointment.
newTitle: Laapataa Ladies Team Disappointed After Oscars 2025 Exit

summary:
Realme 14X 5G Smartphone Launched in India: Key Features and Pricing

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The Realme 14X 5G smartphone has been launched in India, featuring a robust 6000 mAh battery and IP68 + IP69 ratings for water and dust resistance.

  • Battery capacity of 6000 mAh for extended usage.
  • IP68 and IP69 ratings ensure durability against water and dust.
  • Supports 5G connectivity for enhanced internet speeds.
  • Affordable pricing aims to attract a wide range of customers.
“The Realme 14X 5G promises not just performance but also resilience with its sturdy build.”

This launch highlights Realme's commitment to providing feature-rich smartphones at competitive prices.
newTitle: Realme 14X 5G Smartphone Launched in India: Key Features and Pricing

title: R Ashwin retires: Emotional scenes, a warm hug as Rohit Sharma bids good bye to his teammate - The Times of India
summary:
R Ashwin Retires: Emotional Scenes, a Warm Hug as Rohit Sharma Bids Goodbye to His Teammate

Date: Brisbane

Source: Times of India

R Ashwin has officially announced his retirement from international cricket, marking the end of an incredible career. Alongside his captain Rohit Sharma, Ashwin shared an emotional farewell moment with his long-time teammate.

  • Ashwin's announcement came with a heartfelt hug from Rohit Sharma.
  • He expressed gratitude to the BCCI and his fellow players during this tough moment.
  • The announcement occurred following a hard-fought draw against Australia.
  • Ashwin finished his Test career with an impressive total of 537 wickets.
"I had a lot of fun with this team. Would like to thank the BCCI, players and coaches I played with." - R Ashwin

This retirement marks a significant moment for Indian cricket as the team bids farewell to one of its outstanding players.
newTitle: R Ashwin Retires: Emotional Farewell with Rohit Sharma

Updated WTC 2023-25 Points Table After India-Australia 3rd Test Ends In A Draw - News18
summary:
Updated WTC 2023-25 Points Table After India-Australia 3rd Test Ends In A Draw

Date: December 18, 2024

Source: News18

The third Test between India and Australia at The Gabba ended in a draw, affecting both teams' standings in the World Test Championship points table.

  • India retained its No. 3 position but saw its PCT% drop from 57.29 to 55.88.
  • Australia's PCT% fell from 60.71 to 58.89.
  • Each team earned 4 WTC points from the match.
  • Rain affected the match, with only Day 2 being fully played.
  • India managed to avoid a follow-on, with notable contributions from Akash Deep and Jasprit Bumrah.
"The Proteas will confirm their spot in the WTC 2025 final if they win the upcoming series against Pakistan 2-0 or 1-0."

This draw impacts both teams' chances in the ongoing World Test Championship cycle as they prepare for future tests.
newTitle: Updated WTC 2023-25 Points Table After India-Australia 3rd Test Ends In A Draw

Elon Musk says Starlink satellite beams are 'turned off over India’; here's what happened | Today News - Mint
summary:
Elon Musk says Starlink satellite beams are ’turned off over India’; here’s what happened

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Reuters

Musk responded to claims regarding Starlink satellite beams being operational in India, asserting they are turned off. The statement follows reports that a Starlink device was found in the possession of a militant group.

  • Musk denies that Starlink beams are active in India.
  • A device bearing the Starlink logo was used by a militant group, allegedly smuggled from Myanmar.
  • Starlink does not have permission to operate in India.
  • Ethnic violence in Manipur has claimed over 250 lives since May.
  • Indian police are probing Starlink for its alleged use in drug smuggling operations.
“This is false. Starlink satellite beams are turned off over India.” - Elon Musk

This situation highlights the potential misuse of technology in conflict zones and raises questions about regulatory compliance and the reach of satellite services in geopolitically sensitive areas.
newTitle: Elon Musk Clarifies Starlink Satellite Use Over India

Companies ramp up diversity hiring in campus placements to woo investors, impress public | Company Business News - Mint
summary:
Companies ramp up diversity hiring in campus placements to woo investors, impress public

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Company Business News

Companies in India are increasingly focusing on diversity hiring across various roles, aiming to improve their image with investors and the public.

  • Diversity hiring has reportedly risen for the 2025 batch compared to last year.
  • This trend is evident in fields such as software development and mechanical engineering.
  • Placement officers from multiple colleges have highlighted this growth in diversity-focused recruitment strategies.
"Companies are trying to present themselves as forward-thinking entities with good corporate governance norms."

This initiative by companies is aimed at not only fostering an inclusive workplace but also enhancing their attractiveness to investors.
newTitle: Companies Increase Diversity Hiring in India to Attract Investors and Public Attention

title: Watch: Before R Ashwin's Retirement Announcement, The Virat Kohli Hug That Gave It Away - NDTV Sports
summary:
Watch: Before R Ashwin's Retirement Announcement, The Virat Kohli Hug That Gave It Away

Date: December 18, 2024 | Source: NDTV

The Indian cricket team witnessed a poignant moment between R Ashwin and Virat Kohli just before Ashwin announced his retirement. Their emotional hug during the rain-delayed test match against Australia sparked speculation about Ashwin's future.

  • Ashwin was replaced by Ravindra Jadeja for the third Test in Brisbane.
  • The Test match ended in a draw, leaving the series tied at 1-1.
  • The hug between Kohli and Ashwin occurred during a rain delay, leading to retirement announcement predictions.
  • India faced Australia in a rain-interrupted match, with Bumrah being the standout bowler.
“Kohli hugging Ashwin in the dressing room.” — Cricket Tak(@CricketTak12)

The hug symbolized a heartfelt farewell as Ashwin prepares to retire from international cricket.
newTitle: R Ashwin's Emotional Moment with Virat Kohli Before Retirement Announcement

India vs Australia 3rd Test, Day 5 Highlights: Big Blow To WTC Final Hopes As India vs Australia 3rd Test Ends In A Draw - NDTV Sports
summary:
India vs Australia 3rd Test, Day 5 Highlights: Big Blow To WTC Final Hopes As India vs Australia 3rd Test Ends In A Draw

Date: December 18, 2024 Source: NDTV Sports

The third Test between India and Australia concluded in a draw due to incessant rain in Brisbane. Despite India making a valiant effort with the ball, play was halted before they could make a serious challenge for the target of 275 runs.

Key Points:

  • India lost their last wicket and took 7 Australian wickets before rain halted play.
  • Australia declared their innings at 89 runs.
  • Yashasvi Jaiswal and KL Rahul opened for India, scoring 8 runs before the match was called off.
  • The five-match series is now tied 1-1.
  • Upcoming Boxing Day Test will be crucial for both teams.

Notable Quotes:

"Obviously to have interruptions like that wasn't great, but going to Melbourne at 1-1 pretty much gives us that confidence to go out there and pull things towards us." - Rohit Sharma

In conclusion, the draw leaves both teams needing a strong performance in the next match to advance in the series.
newTitle: India vs Australia 3rd Test Ends in Draw Amid Rain

title: Pune Boy, "Influenced By Social Media", Sexually Assaults 3-Year-Old Girl - NDTV
Ravichandran Ashwin announces retirement from international cricket after Gabba Test - The Indian Express
summary:
Ravichandran Ashwin Announces Retirement from International Cricket

Publication Date: December 18, 2024
Source: Indian Express

India’s premier spinner Ravichandran Ashwin has officially announced his retirement from international cricket following the third Test of the Border-Gavaskar Trophy in Brisbane.

  • Ashwin’s retirement came after the second Test with the series tied at 1-1.
  • During a rain break, Ashwin had an emotional conversation with Virat Kohli, culminating in a heartfelt embrace.
  • Ashwin expressed that he still has potential left as a cricketer, intending to showcase his skills in club cricket.
  • He concludes a remarkable 14-year career with India, being the second-highest Test wicket-taker for the nation, amassing 537 wickets.
  • With 765 wickets across all formats, he ranks second only to Anil Kumble in Indian cricket history.
  • Ashwin is also the leading wicket-taker in the World Test Championship.
“This will be my last day as an Indian cricketer in all formats at the international level,” Ravichandran Ashwin.

Despite retiring from internationals, Ashwin will continue to participate in franchise cricket, notably with the Chennai Super Kings in the IPL.
newTitle: Ravichandran Ashwin Announces Retirement from International Cricket

title: Parliament session LIVE: Both houses adjourned till 2pm amid row over Amit Shah's remarks - Hindustan Times
summary:
Parliament session LIVE: Both houses adjourned till 2pm amid row over Amit Shah's remarks

Date: December 18, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The Parliament session has been adjourned amid a dispute over Union Home Minister Amit Shah's comments on BR Ambedkar. The Congress party has demanded an apology for what they argue are disrespectful remarks.

  • Both the Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha have been adjourned till 2pm during the ongoing Winter Session of Parliament.
  • The Congress party criticized Amit Shah's remarks made during a parliamentary debate and called for his resignation.
  • Several bills are being considered, including those related to the representation of Scheduled Tribes in Goa and the regulation of oilfields.
“He has insulted Baba Saheb Ambedkar and the Constitution.” - Mallikarjun Kharge, Congress MP

The disruption in the Parliament highlights tensions between the ruling party and the opposition following controversial statements regarding a key figure in Indian history, BR Ambedkar.
newTitle: Parliament session LIVE: Both houses adjourned till 2pm amid row over Amit Shah's remarks

title: Parliament session LIVE: Amit Shah's Ambedkar remarks stir row, Lok Sabha adjourned till 2pm - Hindustan Times
